website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but it has plenty of programmable keys, so you can set it up for your specific gaming needs.
pros: You can illuminate each individual key differently for  extreme customization
Includes processors and flash memory in the keyboard for fast recall of settings
With the shift-plus feature, you can assign a secondary function to any key
cons: Software can be tough to learn to use to its fullest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming and day to day
customer_reviews.text: It's been my daily driver for over a year now. Only issues i've had was the software. But any issues with the software has since been resolved in future software updates. Took me a little while to get used to, but it was my first mechanical keyboard. I got cherry MX black switches. Can't complain at the price.
customer_reviews.author: RailgunOS

customer_reviews.title: Tons of features, quiet(er), comfortable, and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Not too noisy (not clicky), very responsive, and is fairly comfortable. This keyboard gets used around 40-ish hours a week between gaming and another household member conducting work from home (lots of constant typing). This keyboard along with the software has a ton of features. A little bit of the matte finish next to "ROCCAT" on the bottom of the keyboard was been worn smooth where the lower portion of the left palm rests, but its no big deal at all to me.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R.

customer_reviews.title: And roccat saw the light, that it was good.
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to dislike about the keyboard itself. The keyboard control software has a bit of a learning curve and just don't bother with the separate swarm software to link multiple peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: This Keyboard is just SUPER AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This Keyboard is just SUPER AWESOME!!! Everyone who ever saw this in person just goes with amazement, especially with the ripple effect. I got this specifically to illuminate specific keys for when I'm playing certain games. I just love this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Saint

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: To start, I got the board for 60 dollars. It's big and heavy, but very sturdy. The software is a little clunky, but not flaky. It works and lights up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Overall the keyboard physically is great. Feels solid and made well
customer_reviews.text: Overall the keyboard physically is great. Feels solid and made well. I like the switches. They're easy to actuate, while resistant enough to avoid miss clicks. Great amount of ports and connectivity options. The software for it is terrible. IT IS NOT SUPPORTED MY ROCC AT SWARM. That's unfortunate since ROCCAT seems to be focusing on that. It's native driver sofware is not as customizable as SWARM is. If I could take back this purchase, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Z. Melakayil

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this keyboard. The only thing is that I wish the usb cables were longer. I use it with a PC I built that doubles as a HTMC, so it sits in my media center away from where I sit and I use the TV as a monitor. I had to buy USB extensions. But even so, it still works without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: For my first Mechanical Keyboard I was not disappointed. I love the individual lighting and customization in the software. After researching I was able to find a way to demo a song creating an EQ with the lights. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blittenb

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect Roccat!
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect Roccat ! ! ! Almost..... I would have loved to ripple lighting effect to go into demo mode when my system is idle. That would have been wicked!!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: frederick P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The backlit keys allow for easy visibility. Recommend for those who like gaming.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard. Save the $20 and get the glow ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Save the $20 and get the glow instead. After a week the individual lights are kinda annoying. I'm a heavy fps player and this board hasnt skipped a key! Highly recommend but get the cheaper one
customer_reviews.author: Brian Benson

customer_reviews.title: Gamer dream
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is excellent, so many macros and different things to do with the keyboard. I don't think I'll ever use them all, but the lighting is brilliant and the mechanical keys are smooth and feel amazing to press.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lewandosky

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Had this keyboard for a while and it suits me well.
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: It's a great keyboard! Sounds and feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's a great keyboard! Sounds and feels amazing. The only downside with this keyboard is the drivers. They are impossible to download and activate because they get lost in the files and to enable them the roccat customer support has you delete several random files. Fortunately the keyboard is still good with out them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaimana Williams

customer_reviews.title: The Best by far!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is top notch when it comes to gaming!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for being a single color mechanical keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I should have gotten one of the other RGB keyboards that also do cherry switches or paid more to get the RGB feature. Overall call it buyers remorse but the feel of the keyboard is good. The lighting is passable, the ability to adjust the light for the shift/ctrl/alt of other keys would have been a GREAT option. Pressing shift doesn't shift the light to display the alternate characters any clearer on the number keys across the top of the keyboard. The software is easy to use, the default "rain" screen saver for the keyboard is kind of neat.
customer_reviews.author: Caanis Lupus

customer_reviews.title: Thumb buttons extremely useful, cant wait for the RGB version
customer_reviews.text: Solid mechanical keyboard. Thumb buttons extremely useful, cant wait for the RGB version. Only con for me would be lack of dedicated media keys as this replaced a g510 that had them.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: The Program sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is fine. But the program that it uses. Half of the reason why I purchased it, is terrible. Often times it would reset any macros that I place leaving all the time I spent wasted. If I could I would exchange it for a Roccat Ryos MK FX, Since the swarm program is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tonny

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing keyboard. It is heavy, and the keys were awkward at first, but upon getting used to it the feel is great. The macro software is overall easy to use but the lack of support for identifying the limitations of it and the macro setting caps was very annoying. I have some base macros and editing them with the Roccat Ryos config can be a pain in the ass, but once you learn it's not really that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

product_meta.title: ROCCAT RYOS MK Pro Mechanical Gaming Keyboard with Per-Key Illumination, Black CHERRY MX Key Switch
product_meta.description: The ryos MK Pro offers totally customizable, roccat-engineered per Key illumination in two convenient modes: Smart and manual. This means you can add awesome special effects to your keystrokes, configure your keyboard to highlight your in-game and application key bindings, your modifier keys, your macro sequences and cool downs, your system controls, and much, much more. The included software development Kit ensures that only your imagination is the limit. With the ryos MK Pro, easy-shift[+] becomes the completely remap able easy keyboard. Together with the easy-shift[+] and FN keys, you can assign a secondary key function to virtually every key on the keyboard, to suit every game and key configuration. Add to this the fact that you can store over 500 macros in the keyboard's flash memory and you've got an insanely customizable, fast-acting piece of gaming hardware on your hands. The ryos MK Pro features ultra-advanced anti-ghosting with N-key rollover. This means that no matter how frenzied your intense gaming sessions get, your keyboard will always register every keystroke - and never let you down. Owing to its whopping 32-bit ARM Cortex processor, the ryos MK Pro comes out swinging. Since the MCU is so powerful, not one of the keyboard's advanced features sacrifices an ounce of performance. And with 2 MB of flash memory to store your configurations, your keyboard will Executive all of your keystrokes and macros in real time, without any delay. With ROCCAT R.A.D. You'll never miss a trick. Monitor your skills with at-a-glance overviews of important statistics, Win awards when you hit crucial milestones - and then show Friends on Facebook and other social media how excellent you are.
feature_bullets: Per Key illumination - insane customization possibilities
Easy-shift [+] becomes easy keyboard - assign a secondary function to virtually any key
High powered hardware - Two 32-bit ARM Cortex processors + 2 Mb of flash memory
ROCCAT achievements Display - keep track of your vital statistics

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
